dct_description_sm: From Russian surveys of 1833 with corrections to 1860 ; Published according to Act of Parliament at the Hydrographic Office of the Admiralty May 6th, 1854 ; Sold by J.D. Potter, Agent for the Admiralty Charts ; Engraved by J & C. Walker.
Depths shown by soundings, relief by hachures and spot heights.
Magnetic Variation in 1917, increasing abou 9' annualy.
Shows low water areas, coasts, towns and villages, vegetation, currents, anchorages.
Cautionary note on late editions of Russian chart, dated July 1914.
[Inset chart]: Solovetz Roads / From Russian Govt. Charts, 1896
